definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: From which dynasty was the blue---flower porcelain plate in the Hall of Happiness and Longevity left?
sentences.chinese: 颐和园乐寿堂内的青花大磁盘是哪个朝代的遗物？

sentences.english: Seal, blue and white, the Chinese element.
sentences.chinese: 印章，青花瓷，最中国的元素。

sentences.english: I next attempted to hide the pill in some tuna. Albacore , actually.
sentences.chinese: 接着我又将药片藏在金枪鱼里，其实是青花鱼。

sentences.english: The blue and white Yun silk quilt, exquisite luxury, quiet and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 此款青花雅韵蚕丝被，细腻奢华，安静典雅。

sentences.english: Blue and white porcelain has a white base with blue designs.
sentences.chinese: 青花瓷是一种白地蓝花的瓷器。

sentences.english: Blue and White Porcelain of Yuan Dynasty was not recorded on the historical document.
sentences.chinese: 元青花在历史文献上没有明确的记载。

sentences.english: Blue and white porcelain is broken, five field of the earth return to embrace.
sentences.chinese: 青花瓷碎，五方土重归中华大地怀抱。
青花瓷笔纯陶瓷烧制的笔。

sentences.english: Mackerels are known in Japan for their rich taste but also their high fat content.
sentences.chinese: 青花鱼在日本以其浓郁的口感及高脂肪含量出名。

sentences.english: There are two huge, delicate blue-and-white porcelain bowls in my home.
sentences.chinese: 我家有两个青花瓷海碗，做工很精致。

sentences.english: Judy collects blue and white china.
The emergence of blue and white porcelain is of epoch-making significance in porcelain history.
sentences.chinese: 青花瓷的出现，在陶瓷史上具有划时代的意义。

sentences.english: Underglaze blue is a kind of famous underglaze in Chinese ceramic history.
sentences.chinese: 青花瓷是中国陶瓷史上有名的釉下彩。

sentences.english: A vase with a similar pattern flanked by a pair of ruyi-cloud handles is in the Palace Museum in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京故宫博物院藏有一造型和纹饰类似的青花双耳瓶。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Broccoli seed was the optimum material for preparing sulforaphane.
sentences.chinese: 结论青花菜种子是制备莱菔硫烷的优良原材料。

sentences.english: Kiln Blue and White variety, bright colors, the picture varied, modeling novel.
sentences.chinese: 民窑青花种类丰富，色彩亮丽，画面多样，造型新奇。

definition: celadon, classic Chinese style of ceramic glaze
Xuande Emperor, reign name of fifth Ming emperor Zhu Zhanji 朱瞻基[Zhu1 Zhan1 ji1] (1398-1435), reigned 1426-1436, Temple name 明宣宗[Ming2 Xuan1 zong1]
water pot or goblet (for Chinese calligraphy)
